short_summary: Dredging of the harbour at Balsam Bay, MB
description: The project involves maintenance dredging of the harbour at Balsam Bay, Manitoba
full_summary:
=====

**ADB Tender Announcement**
----------------------------

### Project Information

* **Title (English)**: Harbour Dredging at Balsam Bay, MB
* **Title (French)**: Dragage du Port – Balsam Bay, MB
* **Reference Number**: CB-465-31292727

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 30005950
* **Publication Date**: July 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 30, 2024 @ 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Amendment Date**: July 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 25, 2025

### Tender Status

This tender has closed.

### Tender Description

This project involves maintenance dredging at Balsam Bay, Manitoba, to a grade of 214.70 meters in the entrance channel and basin area. Approximately 1876 cubic meters of material must be dredged and disposed of above the high water mark.

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contact Person**: Joshua Bereza
* **Contact Email**: [Joshua.Bereza@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Joshua.Bereza@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 343-576-8144
* **Contact Address**:
  200 Kent Street
  Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6
  Canada

### Tender Documents

Access the tender documents at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42275/30005950---rfq.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/42275/30005950---rfq.pdf)

Note: The rewritten text maintains all the provided details while rephrasing it in a more professional tone and format. I've grouped similar information together and included bold headings to make it easier to read. I've also removed unnecessary information and kept only relevant details. Markup formatting was added to make the text more readable and organized.
